page.title: 15FARMING
page.content: {Farming}is the major economic activity. The landscape is dominated by improved grazing land supporting flocks of sheep or herds of beef or dairy cattle. In Summer certain fields are noted for providing a hay crop, but{silage}is the predominant winter fodder crop. Fewer farmers are{dairy {producers}owing to the quotas on milk production recently imposed by the European Community. The efficiency of farmers varies. Some are poor and their farms{ill-equipped.}Other farms are{highly mechanised,}with electric milking machines. Most are small in size; some are operated on a part-time basis. Fertilizer is used, but not in large amounts, because the soil is already rich and fertile. The increased use of machines has reduced to number of people employed on farms.
